definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: This paper describes the basic principles of the image digitizer and its development course.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了圖像數字化器的基本原理及其發展過程。

sentences.english: Charaka also knew the fundamentals of genetics.
sentences.chinese: 查拉卡也知道遺傳學的基本原理。

sentences.english: B: Stick with the basics until you know them really well.
sentences.chinese: 堅守住基本原理，直到你瞭然於心。

sentences.english: This paper describes the lower bound theory of 3-D plastic limit analysis.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了三維塑性極限分析下限法的基本原理。

sentences.english: Described are basic principle and construction of tubular seal.
sentences.chinese: 論述了管式密封基本原理和基本構成。

sentences.english: The principle of FH communication is described.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了跳頻通信的基本原理。

sentences.english: The basic mechanism of titanium dioxide photocatalytic water-splitting for hydrogen production is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 簡單介紹了二氧化鈦光催化分解水制氫的基本原理。

sentences.english: This paper deals first with the basic principles of the thermo-electric effect in metal cutting.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先闡明瞭金屬切削中熱電效應的基本原理。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the basic principle of dielectrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了介電泳的基本原理。

sentences.english: At first, the basic principles of VTR playback are described.
sentences.chinese: 首先，介紹錄象機重放的基本原理。

sentences.english: The basic principle and specific process of eutectic melting boriding in salt bath are investigated initially in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對鹽溶共晶化滲硼的基本原理和具體工藝進行了探討。

sentences.english: The basic principle of the worm gearing is analysed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了該失配齧合傳動的基本原理。

sentences.english: One of the first principles of probability is the idea of independence.
sentences.chinese: 概率論第一個基本原理中的一條是事件的獨立性。

sentences.english: The principle of generating high speed true random bit sequence using white noise is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了用白噪聲產生高速真隨機碼的基本原理。

sentences.english: The basic principle of double entry bookkeeping is that every transaction has a twofold effect.
sentences.chinese: 複式記賬法的基本原理是每筆交易都有借貸雙方。

sentences.english: The basic principle of autostereogram is so-called" wallpaper effect".
sentences.chinese: 立體畫的基本原理就是“牆紙效應”。

definition: theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of

pinyin: Meng2 te4 Ka3 luo2 fang1 fa3
